mapper.select:
select * from v_coupon_fetch where 1 = 1 and status = 1
and name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and merchant_id = #{merchantId}
order by orderByField ASC
order by orderByField DESC
order by create_time DESC

SELECT cf.id AS id, m.sex AS sex, u.headimgurl AS headImg, c.`value` AS VALUE, c.`name` AS couponName, c.type AS couponType, m.`name` AS memberName, m.mobile AS mobile, cf.create_time AS createTime, cf.is_used AS isUsed FROM v_coupon_fetch cf LEFT JOIN v_coupon c ON cf.coupon_id = c.id LEFT JOIN v_member m ON cf.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN v_wx_user u ON m.wx_user_id = u.id WHERE cf.`status` = 1 AND c.`status` = 1 AND m.`status` = 1
and c.`name` like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and cf.merchant_id = #{merchantId}
order by orderByField ASC
order by orderByField DESC
order by cf.create_time DESC

SELECT cf.id AS id, cf.verify_code As verifyCode, cf.coupon_id As couponId, c.`name` AS couponName, c.discount As discount, c.value As value, c.use_condition As useCondition, c.description As description, c.start_at As startAt, c.end_at As endAt, cf.is_invalid As isInvalid, cf.is_used As isUsed, c.is_invalid As couponIsInvalid, m.sex AS sex, u.headimgurl AS headImg, c.`value` AS VALUE, c.type AS couponType, m.`name` AS memberName, m.mobile AS mobile, cf.create_time AS createTime, cf.is_used AS isUsed FROM v_coupon_fetch cf LEFT JOIN v_coupon c ON cf.coupon_id = c.id LEFT JOIN v_member m ON cf.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN v_wx_user u ON m.wx_user_id = u.id WHERE cf.`status` = 1 AND c.`status` = 1 AND m.`status` = 1
and cf.member_id = #{memberId}
